metadata.name: Abyss Dragon #1
metadata.description:
One Hallowed Eve an army of hunters broke the long standing peace with dragonkind. With greed in their hearts they murdered and harvested these mythic creatures for their valuable resources. 

The anguished spirits of the murdered dragons corrupted the eggs that they left behind. What hatched was no noble dragon, but an abomination.

This Dragon was originally part of the Abomination Dragon collection of 310 uniquely spooky NFTs. This is the purified form. See the Lore on our website http://mythofdragons.com.
